application

Class CustomerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.CustomerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CustomerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    CustomerManager

    The CustomerManager manages Customers and their respective information. This class includes the logic used to store all customers, add and remove Customers, add and remove barcodes as well as generating barcodes, find customer by name, barcode or phone number, show all Customers and generating PIN codes for Customers.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 9
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
